snippet: Data released Friday shows that a recovery among Western economies has fed improving conditions around Asia, analysts say.
lead_paragraph: Data released Friday shows that a recovery among Western economies has fed improving conditions around Asia, analysts say.

headline.main: Asian Economies Strengthen as Demand for Exports Grows
